pullRequest.title: Auto Query Fixer: implement Sql Error Factory
pullRequest.bodyText:
Implement a class to extract the information from BigQueryException and create BigQuerySqlError. The latter one will be used as an input to generate fixer for the query errors.
Tests are included.

nodes.bodyText: If some keyword is not recognized, will it be "unrecognized name" too or it is only for column name?
I'm not sure if this is the recommended practice to save one line, but up to you :)
